title: FS: Buchner Gold Coin (N284) Marty Sullivan
author: Shorttmail66

posts.post_title: FS: Buchner Gold Coin (N284) Marty Sullivan
posts.post_content:
I have a nice example of an 1887 Buchner Gold Coin (N284) Marty Sullivan Ad overlay for sale for $119 dlvd OBO.  The card has no creases or paper loss and very nice corners for a card over 125 years old.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=179299&d=1424037131[/IMG]      [IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=179300&d=1424037150[/IMG]
Pretty sure that's Marty Sullivan. Billy didn't break into the big leagues for another 12 years
Thank you pbspelly....it has been corrected!!
